name: redux-toolkit-tutorials
description: This repository contains the code for the Redux Toolkit course by [Codevolution](https://www.youtube.com/@Codevolution). The course covers the usage of the Redux Toolkit library for managing state in a React application.

scripts.init: cd redux-demo && npm install && cd ../rtk-demo && npm install && cd ../react-rtk-ts-demo && npm install && cd ../react-rtk-demo && npm install
